title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added `NODE_OPTIONS: '--no-experimental-strip-types'` in CI workflows to work around a Node.js bug.
Updated Node.js engine version to allow 22.18+ (removed `<22.18.0` restriction).
Fixed routing to avoid 404 errors on `/_build` paths.
Adjusted Markdown formatting for enterprise roles documentation.
Removed Node.js version pinning in Dockerfile.
summary:
- Added `NODE_OPTIONS: '--no-experimental-strip-types'` in CI workflows to work around a Node.js bug.
- Updated Node.js engine version to allow 22.18+ (removed `<22.18.0` restriction).
- Fixed routing to avoid 404 errors on `/_build` paths.
- Adjusted Markdown formatting for enterprise roles documentation.
- Removed Node.js version pinning in Dockerfile.
commits: **d02f000**: Merge pull request #57229 from github/repo-sync (by docs-bot)
**abcc34b**: Create docs-internal PR for Early Access preview (#57227) (by Siara)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added `NODE_OPTIONS: '--no-experimental-strip-types'` in CI workflows to work around a Node.js bug.
- Updated Node.js engine version to allow 22.18+ (removed `<22.18.0` restriction).
- Fixed routing to avoid 404 errors on `/_build` paths.
- Adjusted Markdown formatting for enterprise roles documentation.
- Removed Node.js version pinning in Dockerfile.

### Title
Node.js 22.18+ compatibility and routing fixes
